name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voltix: Built for AI specialized for CPUS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn CPU power into rewards: Join Voltix, use your idle CPU to train AI, and start earning today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your view of the internet is valuable. Get paid for it.

AI is the most powerful technology of all time, and now you can earn a stake in its development!

Voltix is a network of over 2 million people that helps developers train artificial intelligence. Once you install the Lite Node, it runs in the background of your computer and uses small amounts of unused CPU power to process AI training data. It can’t see any of your personal information or usage; it just processes data and sells it to AI companies. And you get rewarded for helping!

Voltix only uses a tiny fraction of your CPU power, so you’ll never experience any reduction in the speed or quality of your own computer activities. Just download, sign up, and watch the rewards roll in.

Key Features:

Earn As You Compute: Acquire Voltix Points as you continue to use your computer, opening up a world of exclusive rewards.

User-Friendly Interface: With just a few clicks, you can activate Voltix, monitor your points, and manage your preferences.

Secure and Transparent: We prioritize user privacy and security. Voltix never accesses personal data, and its resource usage is transparently displayed at all times.

AI is poised to change our entire world, and its value should be distributed fairly. Install Voltix today and turn your computing power into a rewarding experience.

Please refer to our FAQ or contact our support team if you have any questions or need further assistance.
